author: craigmcc
msg: Clarify the Javadoc comments about the creation of a default Context (i.e.
a Context with a context path of "").  This Context will be used to
process all requests not explicitly mapped to some other Context by
matching the context path.  Catalina will in fact run without such a
context, but any user request that is not mapped to some other context

author: craigmcc
msg: Port update for Bugzilla #4104 to the 4.0.1 branch as well.

author: remm
msg: - No need to use openStream here, as the content is always cached. That
saves some problems with a security manager when loading resource bundles,
